name: Rock Paper Scissors
description: Allow players to submit a move out of three options, which will be compared to another player to determine the winner. This follows the rules of rock paper scissors.

functions.name: Join Queue
functions.description: This puts a player in the queue

functions.name: Set Match Or Wait
functions.description: If there is already a player in the queue will match them and pass one two players.  If the queue is empty, will put the current player in the queue.
